function.name: fanSpeedMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the fan speed mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the fan speed mode.

predefinedFanSpeedMode.description: The predefined fan speed mode to set for the device.
